comment: online was cool, she cool. its a lot of work for a theater class and she does grade kinda hard for it to be a theater class and the discussions are a lot some times
If you can't get an A in this class you probably don't belong in college. Her d2l may be organized, but it's nothing too ridiculous. Barely tried and got over a 100.

The class itself is an easy A. There's extra credit offered for almost every module. However, Prof Fisher is very unorganized and her D2L makes no sense. She doesn't answer questions in the FAQs. Most of her videos were from years before and she didn't even go back and make new ones. It seemed like she wouldn't log in to D2L for days at a time.

She's so unorganized and doesn't help at all. You can't have a teacher help you if she doesn't know what is happening in the class. Her D2L makes no sense. If your're taking this class be prepared to figure out the assignments yourself. Directions don't help.

She is extremely easy and does not give very much work at all. As long as you try, you will get an A. My only complaint that she is not organized. She will have the quizzes inaccessible until a couple days before they are due and she takes days to respond to e-mails. Most of the time she says, "Read the syllabus," when it's not in the syllabus.

2 required plays. Extra credit if you buy early. 14$ each. Extra credit everywhere. You could do no work and pass with extra credit if it wasn't tied to your work. Watch the plays on youtube or something instead of buying the books. D2l is all over the place so just listen to any videos she makes and skip reading her d2l.

Easy online class. Learned a lot about theatre. You have to go to two required performances so make sure you are able to take time for that. Other than that do all your work and have it turned in on time. Buy the required plays readings. Not the textbook, he

Kia was a pretty good teacher. The class itself was very easy and I imagine it would be very hard to fail unless you just flat out didn't turn in assignments. The workload is very manageable, and there is a lot of extra credit offered. I spent maybe one or two hours per week working on this course and received a 99%. It's definitely and easy A.
She is an excellent teacher. You have to do the homework, and use your book for the test. She is very beautiful also, Do not get distracted by her looks.

I took her online & it was the best choice of my life. Very easy. Weekly discussions & quizzes, which you get unlimited tries on, a few required performances, LOTS of opportunities for extra credit. If you want to make an easy A, i def recommend.
On-line course. Very nice teacher, was happy to help. Instructions were sometimes unclear. Assignments changed periodically from syllabus... so check in to stay on top of things.

Although this class is an easy A, she was awful and I learned nothing. She didn't seem to really understand what she was lecturing over and her lectures were recorded 3 years ago. She trips over her words a lot which gets annoying. Do the assignments (takes an hour or two a week, including lecture) and she'll give you a 150%.. lots of extra credit.

Easiest A you will ever make. If you make a B or lower just drop out of college. You get a good portion of your grade colouring... If you like theatre ignore this class. If you want to boost your GPA, take her.
Pretty easy class, all you really need to do is show up on the days that she says too.

This class is awful, so much work. While quizzes and tests usually have at least two attempts, you will spend hours working on this class every week just to receive a mediocre grade. Never justifies any grades for posts, just enters ridiculous numbers. Listening to her online videos make me want to scream. There are much easier and pleasant classes

All tests and quizes (including midterm) are online and usually have more then one attempt. If you miss a test or quiz she usually reopens it for you. She is very nice and attendance is only mandatory on group days. She is such an easy teacher. I have yet to read or study and I am making an A in the class. I highly recommend taking her!!
Terrible teacher! A lot of pointless busy work. Boring. Easy though
Really nice teacher, horribly dreadful class. It was easy- absolutely boring. Never read any of the books, made A's on all. Easy A, but you do have to go to class or she deducts points....
Easy class.... teacher is boring. If you're a theater major, do not take this class. If you are taking this class because you have to, take her. Easy A.

Easy class, just not a very good teacher. She doesn't seem to know much about what she is teaching - just teaches what the course instructor provides. Attendance not mandatory to know material, but takes roll. One group project. All tests & quizzes online. Never had to read a single play or book. VERY easy A. Just very pointless class.
